entry.title: How to save Bruce Wayne from himself
entry.summary:
Author: MiratheLumina

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,688Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: So English is not my first language *shy* but I have this prompt that I have been in love with for a long time so I was thinking: maybe I can write it and if someone likes it maybe them can write a fic based on it, who knows, maybe someone can get out of a block with this prompt Take a look, see if you like, and if you end up writing a fix based on it, u can please leave a comment warning it so I can go and read? 🥹

entry.title: a red swan song
entry.summary:
Author: ClarkeStetler

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,423Chapters: 19/19Kudos: 1,557

Summary: The night had promised to be a good one- a rarely and blessedly mundane one.So why was Bruce staring down at two of his sons... as actual children? And moreover- how did he fix it?Just another de-age fic, with heaping fluff, moral dilemmas, and hurt/comfort goodies baked in for you personally.

entry.title: In Shadows We Bind Our Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: RaineKellen64

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,348Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 473

Summary: The Batkids are stuck in a time loop where Bruce sacrifices himself to save them every time. Once they break the time loop, nothing is going to stop them from keeping their dad safe, even from himself.OrThe consequences of losing your dad one too many times.OrI love platonic yandere and overprotective Batkids, so I wrote it.-----------------------I have barely read any Batman comics, but I've read a boat load of fanfiction of them. They are OOC.P.S. There is no time line. The title is temporary. This is only my second fic.

entry.title: Bruce's Incidental Grandchild Acquisition
entry.summary:
Author: sleepberries

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,928Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 456

Summary: Bruce Wayne had long accepted that life with his adopted family would never be conventional—but he wasn’t prepared for the tidal wave of grandchildren. Batman may be prepared for Gotham’s criminals, but nothing prepared him for becoming Grandpa.  (Or, five times Bruce is underprepared for a grandchild and one time he's overprepared.)

entry.title: Tell a difference
entry.summary:
Author: Ella_Katz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,267Chapters: 8/19Kudos: 164

Summary: During a battle with unidentified aliens, Bruce gets kidnapped and taken to another dimension with an evil Superman that is determined to make Bruce his lover. Bruce gets stuck with this other being for five months while the good Superman back home desperately tries to find a way to rescue his (possibly) unrequited love.

entry.title: The Hundred Day Curse
entry.summary:
Author: SolaceInSpace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 130,132Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 3,718

Summary: Gotham was literally cursed but no one believed Bruce. He took it upon himself to fix it and after decades of searching, that solution came to him in the form of a little blue vial. Bruce was to take the curse within himself to temper it into something manageable.He thinks the others would call him stupid and stop him if they knew about this, but (un)fortunately for Bruce, his family hasn't spoken to him for forever. There was no one here to stop him.He downed the liquid and woke up as his nine-year-old self.Ch3 Excerpt:“Mother, do you remember those funny clouds above people’s heads I told you about? Well, I’m doing something about them but the process is very lonely. Or not. I think it’s just me. I’m the problem. I can’t seem to get people to like me enough to stay. I know–-… I’m aware that it’s due to my own shortcomings but sometimes, it feels like even the worst monsters have people that love them and yet I have no one.”Bruce let out a humourless chuckle and rested his forehead on his knees.“I just wish there was someone that cared about me.”

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,330Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 38

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made.Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.

entry.title: These Are the Days Returned
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,324Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 83

Summary: Bruce wakes up in a Gotham that isn’t his own—younger, unscarred, in a world where Batman never existed. He is surrounded by children who still found their way into vigilantism without his intervention, who look at him with affection and wariness in equal measure.They believe he’s their Bruce, recovering from a brutal attack, but he knows he isn’t. But as he plays along, trying to piece together the secrets of this world and the reason for his presence here, staying silent may prove just as dangerous—because whoever wanted this world’s Bruce Wayne dead isn’t finished yet.

entry.title: And You, My Father, There on the Sad Height
entry.summary:
Author: notalegalist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,845Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 399

Summary: Batman had long become resistant to Scarecrow’s Fear Toxin. Like he did with every villain he encountered, he had now had years of training combatting the vicious reagent, having developed multiple contingencies and mental tricks to escape its grasp. Yet, nothing had prepared him for a nearly imperceptible and slow-acting version of the drug.The Justice League begins to learn what the Dark Knight with no restraint looks like.

entry.title: He Don’t Want To Be Saved, Don’t Save Him
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,940Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 7

Summary: A serial killer is on the loose in Gotham, and since the press is all over Bruce, it’s harder for him to investigate. When then BAU get a call from the Gotham City Police asking for help, they are more than happy to fly down and help out. Catching a serial killer while all eyes are on him may be hard, but maybe Bruce can put his mind on something else, more like someone else. Preferably the cute FBI agent that has Brucie and the dark knight coming out as one. Bruce is completely lost, and he doesn’t want to be found. Or, a Case Fic with a new ship.

  • Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Batfamily Members & Bruce Wayne

entry.title: Lord of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: GabrielRamos

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,697Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: No one knows where he came from. Only that he survived something that would have destroyed anyone else. Gotham was his forge, but the world is his battlefield. There are secrets that will never be revealed—and a power no one dares name. In the end, there will be no heroes, villains, or gods: only him, and all the others below.

entry.title: red velvet (hurtful, yet sweet)
entry.summary:
Author: cinderellion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,551Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 257

Summary: "I hurt you again! I let another being cloud my mind, and I hurt you again-" Gloved hands with the sharpest of nails graze the aliens skin. Ice blue hues full of soft compassion that no one had ever seen in such a way. "You could hurt me while under control a million times, and I would never love you any less." Or, The batkids are subjected to the sight of a mind controlled Superman essentially trying to murder their father. Low and behold, this wasn't the first time it's happened.
